CMLIB Development Framework

Welcome

CMLIB provides a fabric of classes that work together to help make the majority of PHP programming tasks more intuative and less time consuming to code.

Testing and Quality Control

CMLIB is supplied with a script that performs more than 70 tests to make sure the expected outcomes work on your combination of operating system and PHP version.

You may run this test at time and it is recommnded you run it after install or updating CMLIB: 

 $ cd cmlib/src/lib/test
 $ php testall.php
 ...
 All Done: 70 passed, 0 skipped, 0 failed
